mapper.insert: insert into products (user_id, name, introduce, stock, unit, price, discount) values (#{userId}, #{name}, #{introduce}, #{stock}, #{unit}, #{price}, #{discount})
mapper.select: select product_id, user_id, name, introduce, stock, unit, price, discount from products order by product_id desc
mapper.update: update products set name = #{name}, introduce = #{introduce}, stock = #{stock}, unit = #{unit}, price = #{price}, discount = #{discount} where product_id = #{productId}
update products set stock = stock - #{number} where product_id = #{productId}
update products set stock = stock + #{number} where product_id = #{productId}
